thread.title: Asante Kotoko's anniversary friendly postponed again; to play Veria FC on November 15
thread.title_full: Asante Kotoko's anniversary friendly postponed again; to play Veria FC on November 15

title: Asante Kotoko's anniversary friendly postponed again; to play Veria FC on November 15
text:
Sports News | 9 October 2015 18:10 CET Asante Kotoko's anniversary friendly postponed again; to play Veria FC on November 15 - www.ghanasoccernet.com Asante Kotoko 
Asante Kotoko's international friendly against Greek Veria FC to commemorate their 80 th anniversary celebrations will now be played on 15 November. 
This is the third time the exhibition match has been postponed by organizers Pacific Ghana Limited. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
